Room.Name: Marina Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Marina Way, just north of Rosecrest Street.
Room.LongDescription: Marina Way continues to the north and south, traveling though the central parts of Oceancrest. There is a large building to the east with a large, sparkling gem positioned above the building, casting a purplish hue over the building and some of the nearby streets. Rosecrest Street is directly to the south.
